00036 namespace Hyperspace {

00038   using namespace Hypertable;

00040   class SessionData : public ReferenceCount {
00041   public:
00042     SessionData(struct sockaddr_in &_addr, uint32_t lease_interval, uint64_t _id) : addr(_addr), m_lease_interval(lease_interval), id(_id), expired(false) {
00043       boost::xtime_get(&expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00044       expire_time.sec += lease_interval;
00045       return;
00046     }
00047 
00048     void add_notification(Notification *notification) {
00049       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00050       if (expired) {
00051         notification->event_ptr->decrement_notification_count();
00052         delete notification;
00053       }
00054       else
00055         notifications.push_back(notification);
00056     }
00057 
00058     void purge_notifications(uint64_t event_id) {
00059       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00060       std::list<Notification *>::iterator iter = notifications.begin();
00061       while (iter != notifications.end()) {
00062         if ((*iter)->event_ptr->get_id() <= event_id) {
00063           (*iter)->event_ptr->decrement_notification_count();
00064           delete *iter;
00065           iter = notifications.erase(iter);
00066         }
00067         else
00068           iter++;
00069       }
00070     }
00071 
00072     bool renew_lease() {
00073       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00074       boost::xtime now;
00075       boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00076       if (xtime_cmp(expire_time, now) < 0) {
00077         expired = true;
00078         std::list<Notification *>::iterator iter = notifications.begin();
00079         while (iter != notifications.end()) {
00080           (*iter)->event_ptr->decrement_notification_count();
00081           delete *iter;
00082           iter = notifications.erase(iter);
00083         }
00084         return false;
00085       }
00086       memcpy(&expire_time, &now, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00087       expire_time.sec += m_lease_interval;
00088       return true;
00089     }
00090 
00091     bool is_expired(boost::xtime &now) {
00092       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00093       return (xtime_cmp(expire_time, now) < 0) ? true : false;
00094     }
00095 
00096     void expire() {
00097       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00098       if (expired)
00099         return;
00100       expired = true;
00101       std::list<Notification *>::iterator iter = notifications.begin();
00102       while (iter != notifications.end()) {
00103         (*iter)->event_ptr->decrement_notification_count();
00104         delete *iter;
00105         iter = notifications.erase(iter);
00106       }
00107     }
00108 
00109     void add_handle(uint64_t handle) {
00110       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(mutex);
00111       handles.insert(handle);
00112     }
00113 
00114     boost::mutex mutex;
00115     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00116     uint32_t m_lease_interval;
00117     uint64_t id;
00118     bool expired;
00119     boost::xtime expire_time;
00120     std::set<uint64_t> handles;
00121     std::list<Notification *> notifications;
00122   };
00123 
00124   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<SessionData> SessionDataPtr;
00125 
00126   struct LtSessionData {
00127     bool operator()(const SessionDataPtr &sd1, const SessionDataPtr &sd2) const {
00128       return xtime_cmp(sd1->expire_time, sd2->expire_time) >= 0;
00129     }
00130   };
